overview: ark Foege has over 20 years of experience in product management and marketing. Prior to joining Perlego, Mark served as the Director of Marketing at EssentialMarkets and the Vice President of Marketing for Order Velocity. He was a National Brand Manager at Sears Commercial Sales, successfully launching numerous business-to-business initiatives. Mark also managed the Marketing Department of Jacobson, Jarvis & Co., a non-profit focused software and services company. In addition to his current responsibilities at Perlego, Mark is a lead marketing and public relations instructor at the University of Phoenix.
